title: :mafiaFaction:

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Give somebody a bloody flower at night, roleblocking them with the flower and framing them with the blood.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Whenever somebody with a bloody flower visits someone else, they pass the bloody flower to their target, roleblocking/framing them.
- When you die, all bloody flowers also die and can no longer be passed.
- People do not know that they have the bloody flower.
- __**Part of the Daily Streak Faction**__

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill all who oppose the Mafia.
